overview: The new General Music Director Marcus Bosch discovers the “light Wagner” at his debut in Nuremberg. Under his direction Meister-singer almost becomes a high-spirited, light-hearted comedy. This approach does not detract from the opera’s substance, this is ensured by the select ensemble of singers, the Nuremberg State Orchestra and its new conductor, who thrill the audience and critics from the start.
title: Die Meistersinger von Nürnberg
